dimensions.notes: Credential exposure in source and history plus missing authorization and unsafe Markdown input handling.
bot.py contains unresolved names and broken references that can fail at runtime.
Error handling is brittle and member-tracking model can produce false completeness/omissions.
Two divergent bot implementations raise regression risk and increase change cost.
Missing runbook and CI governance artifacts limit safe operations and onboarding.
No deterministic dependency manifest and known vulnerabilities in tested dependency graph.

overall.rule_applied: At least one unmitigated critical finding remains open.
